orca_what: The ORCA (Optimized Research in Clinical AI) Group at BeamWorks is a collaborative team of AI specialists and clinical researchers, focused on healthcare applications.
orca_goal_body1: We develop and validate cutting-edge AI technologies, and we facilitate effective communication between healthcare providers and patients.
orca_goal_body2: Our optimized AI empowers healthcare professionals, leading to more accurate diagnoses and personalized treatment plans, that ultimately improve patient outcomes.
orca_benefit_goal1_contents: We foster collaboration between AI specialists and clinical researchers, to drive advances in healthcare.
orca_benefit_goal2_contents: We offer research opportunities to participate in clinical trials, contributing to cutting-edge AI research.
orca_benefit_goal3: Regular Symposia and Newsletters with Timely Updates
orca_benefit_goal3_contents: We host regular symposia, to facilitate dynamic collaboration between AI specialists and clinical researchers.
interested: Are you interested in joining the ORCA Group?
contact_sentence: Please provide us with your email address so that we can send it to the ORCA Group for confirmation. Once verified, we will forward the information to your email.
researcher_introduce: At the ORCA group, dedicated AI specialists and accomplished clinical researchers, are united by a shared passion for advancing healthcare through innovative AI technologies.
measures: Outcome Measure / Measure Description / Time frame
events_phrase: Learn about ORCA's upcoming events for potential meet-ups.
past_events_phrase: Take a glimpse into ORCA's past events.
newsletter_recommand: Please enter your email address, and the fascinating newsletter will be delivered to your inbox from the date of your subscription.
business_adress: 107, 3rd Floor, 136-gil, Chilgok Central Road, Buk-gu, Daegu, South Korea (Hakjeong-dong)
name: Name
